Text:
A bit laggy, but good quality and sound.
Definately watchable
@glosack - Unfortunately, this is the quality provided by the website :/
In case anyone is wondering, it's only 13fps.  It looks horrible, and I'm glad I didn't pay for this.
Sadly, I did pay for it and I find it unwatchable.  It's only $5 and half goes to charity, but it is still unacceptable.
Thanks dude, I appreciate the effort!
Half goes to 'charity'. The other half went... somewhere else, probably some to Nox Solutions who seem to be to blame for fucking this up. Thanks majorpayn, seeders.
The Rumble website has a new 1.77Gb video with 30fps, so don't bother on this version, the 1.49Gb version has only 13fps because of technical problems.
@skoumoun Thanks for the update, now we just have to wait for it to show up. Not seeing it here yet. (On the Bay).
I hope some one ups the 30fps even if not 720p.  I'm dying to watch this.
I bought this after downloading the 13fps version. The 1.77gb version is 29fps but it's somewhat choppy too. Not as bad as the version here though.
Thanks for the show, i was looking for it.

"escortlvr at 2012-10-09 06:33 CET: 
 I bought this after downloading the 13fps version. The 1.77gb version is 29fps but it's somewhat choppy too. Not as bad as the version here though."

Same here. I paid for and downloaded the high quality version. Still suffers from choppy video even though the file reports 29.970 fps.
